      • tryRequestReturnObject

        @Nonnull
Either<ObjectBorower.Action,T> tryRequestReturnObject()
                                                        throws InterruptedException
        Non Blocking method.
        Returns:
        null if request was not made, the object if available, or REQUEST_MADE if request could be made to return Object.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • tryReturnObjectIfNotInUse

      • tryReturnObjectsIfNotNeededAnymore

        @Nullable
Collection<T> tryReturnObjectsIfNotNeededAnymore()
                                                    throws InterruptedException
        This method is a cleanup method. The purpose is to recover all borrowed objects before once this borrower will never use them anymore...
        Returns:
        all objects borrowed
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • nevermind

        boolean nevermind(T object)
        Notify borower that object has been received back from another borrower. return true is indeed object was from here, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        object -
